feed.title: RecordWright
feed.subtitle: Web UI Automation for Pro-Coder and No-Coder.

entry.title: v0.5.40 Version Released
entry.content: Improved first time hit rate in eventrecorder.js by adding auto-reload feature.
entry.summary: Improved first time hit rate in eventrecorder.js by adding auto-reload feature.

entry.title: v0.5.44 Version Released
entry.content: Improved click function to dodge issue from snapshot capture
entry.summary: Improved click function to dodge issue from snapshot capture

entry.title: v0.5.43 Version Released
entry.content:
Increased timeout to fix bug.
Updated injection operation to fix long waiting time issue.
Enhanced Bluestone’s recognition feature.
entry.summary:
Increased timeout to fix bug.
Updated injection operation to fix long waiting time issue.
Enhanced Bluestone’s recognition feature.

entry.title: v0.5.39 Version Released
entry.content:
1. Enhanced unit test.
  2. Added on-demand tab capture feature.
  3. Reverted “Test”.
